name: WebGLRenderingContext.disableVertexAttribArray
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.disableVertexAttribArray() method of the WebGL API turns the generic vertex attribute array off at a given index position.

refs.name: WebGL 1.0
refs.description: The definition of 'disableVertexAttribArray' in the 'WebGL 1.0' specification.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glDisableVertexAttribArray' in the 'OpenGL ES 2.0' specification.
